title: Proposal that Traditional Chinese Medicine Become a Regulated Profession
description: This proposal document outlines the reasons for regulating the profession (with reference to the Health Practitioners Competence Assurance Act), and provides a brief background on the profession of traditional Chinese medicine. Submissions closed in August 2011.
cleaned_text: Published online: 02 June 2011 Summary Traditional Chinese medicine practitioners' groups applied to the Ministry of Health to be regulated under the Health Practitioners Competence Assurance Act 2003. The proposal document that can be accessed from this page was issued and submissions invited, closing August 2011. The proposal document outlines the reasons for regulating a profession (with reference to the Health Practitioners Competence Assurance Act), provides a brief background on the profession of traditional Chinese medicine, and provides discussion questions
